commit message: Update Android SDK version
Use proper icon for the tag and branch create event
Use OkHttp as HttpClient
Don't show the repo name on it's news feed
Fix a broken test
Improve test execution in Travis
Don't try to open 'plans', 'pricing', and 'join' and fix link in translation
Add support for setting a user's avatar to a menu item
Add basic Navigation Drawer
Remove the Action Bar spinner
Add basic Toolbar to the Home Activity
Change all Action Bars to Toolbars
Merge basic Material Design Navigation Drawer and Toolbar
Fix text for the 'fork' event
Replace the deprecated ActionBarActivity with AppCompatActivity
Fix crash if the user exits the app without logging in
If we can't open an URL try to open it with a browser before showing an error
Fix crash when pressing the back button in TwoFactorAuthActivity
Remove duplicated dependencies
Bump gson to 2.4
Don't use OkHttp on Froyo as it requires at least API level 9

Don't load avatars on Froyo because Picasso uses OkHttp

This will be fixed in the next release of Picasso
Let the comment pager adapter set the page titles
Use normal tab pager layout for the search activity
Initial implementation of Material Design tabs
Fix wrong placement of the loading indicator
Don't use '?android:attr/selectableItemBackground' on API versions bellow 11
Clear up themes
Change the theme of the app
Remove resources of the old theme

Issue comments and events are not clickable

Fixes #80
Remove Travis CI integration, as it's very unreliable

Don't delete all the issue info when loading a pull request.

Fixes #22

Show when an issue has been merged

Fixes #81

Add support for Gist links with the owner in the URL

Fixes #61

Update the list of supported markup formats

CC #75
Improve the theme
Update CHANGELOG.md
Don't use a new type of grey for the Navigation Drawer
No need to define a background for list items in normal state
Show pull request on repositories that have issues disabled
Properly open links to a repository's issues or pull requests
Update the intent after updating the repository so child fragments can access the newest information

New button to report an issue directly to ForkHub.

Closes #83
Update Play Store information and images
Improved some news feed messages
Change the press state background only on versions with the ripple effect
Update CHANGELOG.md
ForkHub v1.1.0
